original_title: El Día Con Todos Los Colores
overview: The shore, the colours of the sea and the water itself seem to conjure up distant and seemingly unrelated memories. But, are the memories our own? Do we know her? Or, are these images recalled from somewhere else? Memory itself starts to unravel in this light meditation on the nature of time and its resemblance to water.
title: El Día Con Todos Los Colores
